Headline: No trains between Forest Park and UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC-Halsted and Forest Park due to police activity near Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC-Halsted and Forest Park due to police activity near Cicero.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and UIC-Halsted at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between UIC/Halsted and Forest Park to provide connecting service.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
